titleStmt.title: The state of the birth temporal & spiritual and the duty and state of a child, youth, young-men, aged-men, and fathers in the truth : also, shewing that children are the heritage of the Lord, and that he hath a glory in them / by George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
